title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4831.17 - Assistance of counsel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4831.17 - Assistance of counsel

State Regulations

Parties to an appeal may be represented by counsel; provided, however, the attorney shall be a member in good standing of the Bar
of the State of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4831.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
